articles.author: TOI Lifestyle Desk
articles.title: Silent signs your liver may be struggling: Body changes to watch for and the everyday habits behind it - The Times of India
articles.description: Most of us don’t really think about our liver until something goes wrong. But this hardworking organ is like the body’s personal detox center, filtering out toxins, breaking down fats, storing energy, and keeping things running smoothly. The problem? The live…
articles.content:
Now that you know some of the silent signals, lets talk about the daily habits that could be behind them. Spoiler: a lot of these are things many of us do without thinking.
